meta.description: Determine the maximum data flow from Data Center 0 to Data Center 7 in a network of 8 data centers with specified bandwidth capacities.

sets.name: ARCS
sets.description: Directed connections between data centers with bandwidth capacities

params.name: capacity
params.description: Bandwidth capacities between data centers in TB/h

vars.name: flow
vars.description: Flow of data between data centers in TB/h

vars.name: F
vars.description: Total flow from source to sink in TB/h

objective.name: max_total_flow
objective.description: Maximize the total data flow from Data Center 0 to Data Center 7

constraints.name: source_flow_balance
constraints.description: Flow balance at the source node (Data Center 0)

constraints.name: sink_flow_balance
constraints.description: Flow balance at the sink node (Data Center 7)

constraints.name: flow_conservation_1
constraints.description: Flow conservation at Data Center 1

constraints.name: flow_conservation_2
constraints.description: Flow conservation at Data Center 2

constraints.name: flow_conservation_3
constraints.description: Flow conservation at Data Center 3

constraints.name: flow_conservation_4
constraints.description: Flow conservation at Data Center 4

constraints.name: flow_conservation_5
constraints.description: Flow conservation at Data Center 5

constraints.name: flow_conservation_6
constraints.description: Flow conservation at Data Center 6
